verses.verse: And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> to me, saying,<WH559>

Son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> prophesy<WH5012> against<WH413> the prophets<WH5030> of Israel<WH3478> that prophesy,<WH5012> and say<WH559> you to them that prophesy<WH5012> out of their own hearts,<WH3820> Hear<WH8085> you the word<WH1697> of the LORD;<WH3068>
Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Woe<WH1945> to the foolish<WH5036> prophets,<WH5030> that follow<WH1980> <WH310> their own spirit,<WH7307> and have seen<WH7200> nothing!<WH1115>
O Israel,<WH3478> your prophets<WH5030> are like the foxes<WH7776> in the deserts.<WH2723>

You have not gone<WH5927> up into the gaps,<WH6556> neither made<WH1443> up the hedge<WH1447> for the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> to stand<WH5975> in the battle<WH4421> in the day<WH3117> of the LORD.<WH3068>

They have seen<WH2372> vanity<WH7723> and lying<WH3577> divination,<WH7081> saying,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> said:<WH5002> and the LORD<WH3068> has not sent<WH7971> them: and they have made others to hope<WH3176> that they would confirm<WH6965> the word.<WH1697>

Have you not seen<WH2372> a vain<WH7723> vision,<WH4236> and have you not spoken<WH1696> a lying<WH3577> divination,<WH4738> whereas you say,<WH559> The LORD<WH3068> said<WH5002> it; albeit I have not spoken?<WH559>

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Because<WH3282> you have spoken<WH1696> vanity,<WH7723> and seen<WH2372> lies,<WH3576> therefore,<WH3651> behold,<WH2005> I am against<WH413> you, said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

And my hand<WH3027> shall be on the prophets<WH5030> that see<WH2374> vanity,<WH7723> and that divine<WH7080> lies:<WH3576> they shall not be in the assembly<WH5475> of my people,<WH5971> neither<WH3808> shall they be written<WH3789> in the writing<WH3791> of the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> neither<WH3808> shall they enter<WH935> into the land<WH127> of Israel;<WH3478> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Because,<WH3282> even because<WH3282> they have seduced<WH2937> my people,<WH5971> saying,<WH559> Peace;<WH7965> and there was no<WH369> peace;<WH7965> and one built<WH1129> up a wall,<WH2434> and, see,<WH2009> others daubed<WH2902> it with untempered<WH8602> mortar:

Say<WH559> to them which daub<WH2902> it with untempered<WH8602> mortar, that it shall fall:<WH5307> there shall be an overflowing<WH7857> shower;<WH1653> and you, O great<WH417> hailstones,<WH68> <WH417> shall fall;<WH5307> and a stormy<WH5591> wind<WH7307> shall rend<WH1234> it.
See,<WH2009> when the wall<WH7023> is fallen,<WH5307> shall it not be said<WH559> to you, Where<WH346> is the daubing<WH2915> with which<WH834> you have daubed<WH2902> it?

Therefore<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> I will even rend<WH1234> it with a stormy<WH5591> wind<WH7307> in my fury;<WH2534> and there shall be an overflowing<WH7857> shower<WH1653> in my anger,<WH639> and great<WH417> hailstones<WH68> <WH417> in my fury<WH2534> to consume<WH3615> it.

So<WH3651> will I break<WH2040> down<WH2040> the wall<WH7023> that you have daubed<WH2902> with untempered<WH8602> mortar, and bring<WH5060> it down to the ground,<WH776> so<WH3651> that the foundation<WH3247> thereof shall be discovered,<WH1540> and it shall fall,<WH5307> and you shall be consumed<WH3615> in the middle<WH8432> thereof: and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

Thus will I accomplish<WH3615> my wrath<WH2534> on the wall,<WH7023> and on them that have daubed<WH2902> it with untempered<WH8602> mortar, and will say<WH559> to you, The wall<WH7023> is no<WH369> more, neither<WH369> they that daubed<WH2902> it;

To wit, the prophets<WH5030> of Israel<WH3478> which prophesy<WH5012> concerning<WH413> Jerusalem,<WH3389> and which see<WH2374> visions<WH2377> of peace<WH7965> for her, and there is no<WH369> peace,<WH7965> said<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

Likewise, you son<WH1121> of man,<WH120> set<WH7760> your face<WH6440> against<WH413> the daughters<WH1323> of your people,<WH5971> which prophesy<WH5012> out of their own heart;<WH3820> and prophesy<WH5012> you against<WH5921> them,

And say,<WH559> Thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Woe<WH1945> to the women that sew<WH8609> pillows<WH3704> to all<WH3605> armholes,<WH679> <WH3027> and make<WH6213> kerchiefs<WH4555> on the head<WH7218> of every<WH3605> stature<WH6967> to hunt<WH6679> souls!<WH5315> Will you hunt<WH6679> the souls<WH5315> of my people,<WH5971> and will you save<WH2421> the souls<WH5315> alive<WH2421> that come to you?

And will you pollute<WH2490> me among<WH413> my people<WH5971> for handfuls<WH8168> of barley<WH8184> and for pieces<WH6595> of bread,<WH3899> to slay<WH4191> the souls<WH5315> that should not die,<WH4191> and to save<WH2421> the souls<WH5315> alive<WH2421> that should not live,<WH2421> by your lying<WH3576> to my people<WH5971> that hear<WH8085> your lies?<WH3576>

Why<WH3651> thus<WH3541> said<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Behold,<WH2005> I am against<WH413> your pillows,<WH3704> with which<WH834> you there<WH8033> hunt<WH6679> the souls<WH5315> to make them fly,<WH6524> and I will tear<WH7167> them from your arms,<WH2220> and will let the souls<WH5315> go,<WH7971> even the souls<WH5315> that you hunt<WH6679> to make them fly.<WH6524>

Your kerchiefs<WH4555> also will I tear,<WH7167> and deliver<WH5337> my people<WH5971> out of your hand,<WH3027> and they shall be no<WH3808> more<WH5750> in your hand<WH3027> to be hunted;<WH4686> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>

Because<WH3282> with lies<WH3576> you have made the heart<WH3820> of the righteous<WH6662> sad,<WH3512> whom I have not made sad;<WH3510> and strengthened<WH2388> the hands<WH3027> of the wicked,<WH7451> that he should not return<WH7725> from his wicked<WH7563> way,<WH1870> by promising<WH2421> him life:<WH2421>

Therefore<WH3651> you shall see<WH2372> no<WH3808> more<WH5750> vanity,<WH7723> nor<WH3808> divine<WH7081> divinations:<WH7081> for I will deliver<WH5337> my people<WH5971> out of your hand:<WH3027> and you shall know<WH3045> that I am the LORD.<WH3068>
